messages.message: Hi @Serena, I have tried the delete API to delete that folder but I think still it's not fixing the current issue.
Maybe when @achao comes back online, he can suggest a way to delete the folder with the empty file name
@Ramesh can you add me as a collaborator to that workspace? I can delete it for you. Can you also confirm how/when/which environment you created this folder?

Hi Aaron, I have added you as a manager for "my-repo" workspace. I did it on Prod yesterday through Delete API.
https://instabase.com/rameshkatiyar/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/
got it! can you try now?
we have added path validation in grpc-file-service to prevent names like this, but maybe this slipped through… will fix this!
Yes. Now it's working fine. But looks like I have lost my data in the "my-repo" workspace. But thanks, Aaron for the quick help. :slightly_smiling_face:
hmm I didn’t see any other files in that folder, do you know how much data you expected?
